about_the_game:
Making The Glitch Fairy was a long journey, and we want to share its history with you!

This PDF artbook contains over 400 pages of cut content, concept art, promo art, dev commentary, level plans, and more!

We also included a new, canon illustrated short story that covers the backstory of Anabelle (23 pages).

INSTRUCTIONS TO OPEN THE PDF BOOK

The PDF (artbook) will be downloaded to your The Glitch Fairy Steam folder.

You can access it quickly by right-clicking The Glitch Fairy in your Steam library, then hover over "Manage", then clicking on "Browse local files".

A window will pop up, and you should see the PDF file, named The Glitch Fairy Artbook.
